metadata.title: CVE-2018-14360 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. nntp_add_group in newsrc.c has a stack-based buffer overflow because of incorrect sscanf usage.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-14360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

neomutt - 20180716+dfsg.1-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neomutt package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180716+dfsg.1-1.2').
